title: Apple TV Plus: UK price, release date and everything we know about the new streaming service set to rival Netflix
text:
Apple has declared war on Netflix with the launch of its new streaming TV service that will showcase original shows for £4.99 per month.

Named Apple TV+, the service will be available in 100 countries with buyers of an iPhone, iPad or Mac getting a free year of streaming.

Apple’s TV+ service, first previewed in March with Oprah Winfrey, Jennifer Aniston and other stars, will lack a large back catalog and instead focus on original movies and TV shows. At its event, Apple showed a trailer for See with Jason Momoa.

Still, some analysts have suggested Apple TV+ could top 100 million subscribers in the next half-decade, which would make it a major challenger to Netflix and Amazon.
